brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts an activity in which you must match the terms to their corresponding definition.

Terms
One.BECN
Two.DLCI
Three.FECN
Four.C I R
Five.D E
Six.SVC
Seven.PVC

Definitions.
A.The type of VC most service providers will not permit.
B.Used to inform a receiving device that congestion was experienced.
C.The type of virtual circuit most often used by Frame Relay.
D.The Layer 2 address used by Frame Relay.
E.The contracted data rate that the service provider agrees to transfer.
F.Used to inform a sending device that congestion has occurred.
G.Marks a frame as being less important on a network.
